name: Chesscargot
tagline: chess client using chess.js and chessboard.js written in PHP/MySql
body:
# Snail Chess || Echesscargot

This chess client uses chess.js and chessboard.js and uses PHP/MySql. It is for playing slow games of chess.

This code is intended to be loaded onto a server as a private game database where no logins are required; though I'm thinking of adding a simply authentication/password splash page, for security against vandalism. Check out my instance, and challenge me at chess.

##Future Features:
  • add game viewer, eg. forward as well as undo button.
  • email moves, or ping the next move
  • highlight whose turn it is in the database table.
###Dependencies: Php
MySQL
